General.Name: Hanssem
General.Description: Hanssem Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes kitchen furniture and interior-related products in the United States and China. It also focuses on home interior field related products. The company offers furniture, appliances, household accessories, fabric products, etc. for kitchen, bedroom, living room, and bathroom. In addition, the company provides home remodeling solutions for kitchen and bathrooms. Further, the company offers construction, remodeling/kitchen, and furniture/living good services. Additionally, the company is involved in the distribution of imported interior furniture. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Ansan-si, South Korea.
